reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting Vietnam to meet its international obligation in reducing green house gas emission in line with Paris Accord.

description.narrative: The project will draw on UK expertise to provide hands-on technical support to the Vietnamese government over the next three years, by assisting the inventory compilation team and associated Ministries/Agencies to meet international climate change through the implementation of the National Greenhouse Gas Inventory System, as mandated by the Prime Minister, generating opportunities for low carbon investment from UK financial institutions and companies

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
